Test frequency - Once prior to works commencing

Test frequency - Every new Drainage Line and prior to work commencing
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - IFC Cover Form
Test frequency - Prior to works commencing
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - ?
Method/Description - Confirm pipe diameter, class and jointing type as shown on the drawings and that pipes are in correct and good condition.
Test frequency - Each delivery to site
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Onsite Check Sheet
Method/Description - Specification compliance – manufacturer’s certificate to TNZ F/3 for pipe and pre-cast units
Test frequency - Each delivery to site
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Compliance Cettifcates
1.2.3 - Materials – Grading for Bedding, Haunch and Sides Zones AP20
Method/Description - Confirm the material for bed, haunch, side and overlay zones meet the requirements of AS/NZS 3725:2007 table 6.
• NZS4402 Supplement No 1:1988 - Test 2.8.1 (or similar approved)
• Determination of the particle size distribution Standard method by wet sieving
Test frequency - 1 per source then 1 per 500 m3
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test Report
1.2.4 - Materials – Compaction Curves Bedding, Haunch and Sides Zones AP20
Method/Description - Establish the optimum moisture content and minimum and maximum dry density.
• NZS4402 Supplement No 1:1988 - Test 4.1.1 or similar approved
Test frequency - 3 no. tests  per source with minimum 5 points
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test Report
1.2.5 - Materials - Structural Fill and for Overlay Zones (AP65)
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test Reports
Test frequency - 1 per source then 1 per 500 m3
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test Report
Method/Description - To inspect geotextile and is the proper type and no tears, rips or other signs of deterioration.
Test frequency - Check each lot (1 roll)
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Onsite Checklist
Method/Description - Specification compliance – manufacturer’s certificate to TNZ F/7 2003
Test frequency - Check each lot (1 roll)
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Manufactures Certifcate
Method/Description - Testing trench foundation material to assess is undercut is required. Scala penetrometer test as per NZS4402.6.5.2:1988 for non-cohesive materials. Table 18
Test frequency - 2 nos. scala penetrometer tests / 5m of trench
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test Report
Method/Description - 1.5m benches to be constructed strating from rock face
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Onsite Check List
2.2.1 - Construction of embedment, bed, haunch and side zones using AP20
Method/Description - Test 4.2.1 Nuclear Densometer Direct Mode or NZS 4407:1991 or Test 4.2.2 Nuclear Densometer Backscatter Mode and NZS 4407:1991;
Test frequency - 3no NDM test per 10 m max centres tests on combined lifts upto 300mm lift and minimum of test at the bottom layer, middle of pipe and top of pipe
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test Report
Method/Description - Test 4.2.1 Nuclear Densometer Direct Mode or NZS 4407:1991 or Test 4.2.2 Nuclear Densometer Backscatter Mode and NZS 4407:1991; Undrained shear Strength
Test frequency - 1no NDM and 1no Shear Vane Test per 20m max canters at 300mm lifts
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test Report
Method/Description - Visual test prior to backfill above the side zones – line and level, correct installation, and joints are all sealed.
Test frequency -  Review every 10m and witness every 25m
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report
Method/Description - Foundation and bedding testing as per pipes, using AP65 as opposed to AP20. Visual inspection of joints between pipe and wingwall
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report, Onsite Checksheet
Method/Description - Antiseep collars to be embeded 200mm horizontaly into side of trench and 400mm below base of trench. To be located every second pipe joint. Concrete strength >=20MPa
Test frequency - Each Anti Seep Collar
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - DSR Inspection (Pre-Pour), Pre-Pour Checksheet
Method/Description - Cut off Toe to be embeded 1m (or note 4) from top of wingwall base, to be consructed as per IFC Drawings
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Pre-Pour Checksheet, Detail Sheets
Method/Description - DSR to inpect geotextiles before rip - rap is laid. Max drop heights to be adhered to when placing rip-rap
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Geotextile Installation Check Sheet
Method/Description - 25% embedment depth with meandering low flow path from voild filled riprap. Spat ropes for CU-17
Test frequency - Review every 10m and witness every 25m
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Onsite Checksheet
Method/Description - Constructed as per IFC Drawings
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Onsite Checksheet
Method/Description - As built survey of coordinates and invert levels, structures, and pipe ends
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - As-Built
Method/Description - Check conformance with the specification and assess the asset condition post construction
Test frequency - To be completed following pipe construction but prior to spat rope installation
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - CCTV log Report as per the standard
